item.title: Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS)
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-4104: Not vuln ; CVE-2021-44228: Fix NCSC-NL Systems that serve customer traffic are patched against the Log4j2 issue. Working to apply the patch to sub-systems that operate separately from SNSâ€™s systems that serve customer traffic. item.title: Amazon WorkSpaces/AppStream 2.0
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-4104: Not vuln ; CVE-2021-44228: Fix NCSC-NL Not affected with default configurations. WorkDocs Sync client versions 1.2.895.1 and older within Windows WorkSpaces, which contain the Log4j component, are vulnerable; For update instruction, see source for more info Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-20 12:37:57 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.
